description:
Global ad giant WPP has closed AKQA Bloom, a Miami-based communications agency specialising in sustainability campaigns, according to an email to staff obtained by DeSmog, and merged its operations with parent agency AKQA. Founded in 2022, AKQA Bloom positioned itself as a forward-thinking advertising agency dedicated to environmental sustainability and social impact. The AKQA staff email said that […]

The post EXCLUSIVE: Global Ad Giant WPP Shutters Sustainability-Focused Agency appeared first on DeSmog.
title: EXCLUSIVE: Global Ad Giant WPP Shutters Sustainability-Focused Agency

description:
On a clear day overlooking the inner harbour of Prince Rupert, a northwest British Columbia town home to Canada’s third largest port, chances are you’ll see a spurt of water coming from the surface of the ocean. “I’ve lived here my whole life and every once in a while, you might get a glimpse of […]

The post Some First Nations Ready ‘To Rise’ If Poilievre Lifts BC Oil Tanker Ban appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Some First Nations Ready ‘To Rise’ If Poilievre Lifts BC Oil Tanker Ban
